document_data.name: House of Thorne
document_data.inhabitants: Inhabitants of the House of Thorne
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Thorne''' was a dilapidated old mansion in [[Waterdeep|Waterdeep's]] [[Sea Ward of Waterdeep|Sea Ward]].
document_data.Structure: The home was named for the thorn vines that grew on its walls.
document_data.History: Around [[1079 DR]], the House of Thorne was the site on which the [[Circle of Skulls]] attempted the [[ritual]] of the [[First Flensing]]. In [[1480 DR]], noblewoman and [[wizard]] [[Rilyanna Saerfynn]] attempted to complete the ritual in the house's basement but was killed by [[Quessahn Uthraebor]].
